posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: August 30, 2016 at 1:19 PM#4it is not possible to access the channelset in the calculator via commandline.You will need to generate Presets, to use my syntax(create a preset in the Control PresetPool, labeled "Lamp On")

posts.author: tomvis
posts.post_text: August 30, 2016 at 1:24 PM#5Ah ok its not possible,My goal was to create a macro to set up that control preset for a string of fixtures as part of start of the day automation. I guess that step will just have to be manual.Thanks
